Name: Salyut π
About the game: Salyut π is a FIRST PERSON SHOOTER, with a great ATMOSPHERE. This game this game is set in a futuristic base, all this with great GRAPHICS. You are going to fight robots with just your trusty gun. You go down hallways, praying there isn't a robot around the corner. ah, too. Beware of the toxic gas that affects the base. Lucky soldier.
